item.title: Curated list of amazing websites - Part 1
item.description: Amazing websites There are websites which are fun to surf in the web world. Some of them are useful in day-to-day life. But there are some websites which are made with the sheer genius and make us wonder “How they made this?”. So, this is a curated list of such websites Part 1. WebGL fluid simulation As the name suggests, one can play with fluid simulation all day. It works on any web browser irrespective of their OS platform.
